title: Looking for Bronze players
body:
Looking for some decent bronze players looking to climb, silver works too.

Requirements: 

- Have voice comms such as Skype, Curse Voice, TS3, Discord
- Be decent
- Dont play urgot/teemo
- Have a main role and champion pool which you stick to
- Know how to fight in a teamfight (such as Focusing and Kiting)
- Be able to constantly win lane and be ahead in CS
- Don't feed

replies.body:
Mid Main
Keen to play 
Win lane 90% of the time
Hit me up with a msg

Heya, Im looking to play with you as well. I do main ADC but I reckon I do pretty well as a mid laner too. 
My average ADC scores are below.
Sivir: 191.5 cs 7.0/4.5/6.0 50% winrate
Corki: 185.0 cs 11.7/6.5/8.2 50% winrate
Lucian: 144.4 cs 7.3/5.4/6.6 57% winrate
Twitch 145.8 cs 8.0/4.5/11.0 100% winrate (played only twice in ranked)

And you might be wondering why I cant get out of Bronze 5?
Its because my mid lane scores are pretty good but I always lose.
I also didn't write down any of the other ADC that I have a poor winrate on.
Anyhow, I can play with you on Saturday, around 3-5pm. I have a pretty packed schedule now.
Added you! I consistently win lane either in cs, kills or both (mostly adc but occasiionaly plays mid as well)

Looking for the same thing, added you!
So tired of going 3/1/3 in the jungle, then ending up 3/7/3 because there's a 11/3 cait running around 1-shotting everybody, because she'd been fed by all lanes..
